title: tiruvaruL tara
sahitya:
tiruvaruL tara ghana vicAramA dInanAna nAn oru bhAramA ambA


anupallavi

  tiruvaDiyal adoru tuNaiyariyAp-pEdai dinam oru kaNam unnai marandaduNDO
 			(madhyama kAlam)
cintai noNDuzhala viDuvadum dharmamA ammA varmamAsundarEshan
magizh madurai mInAkSi tollai tIra irangik-kaTAkSittut-


caraNam    kavalaigaL alaiyAi aDimaiyait-tAkka kalanginEnE vErevar kai tUkka
tivalai aruL tara tIrumen Ekkam dayai nidhiyE irangi vandennaik-kAkka
